title: The Dow Was About to Hit a New High. Then Saudi Arabia Was Attacked.
text:
The Dow Jones Industrial Average was in spitting distance of a record high. Then Saudi Arabia was attacked. And now the market has another excuse not to set a record.

The market has been full of excuses these days. The Dow was in position to hit a high at the end of July, when U.S. President Donald Trump’s tweets announcing new tariffs on China sent the market tumbling. It happened in May, too, when the market barely broke its October high, before selling off. And as we’ve mentioned many times before, the market isn’t all...
description: The Dow was in spitting distance of a record high. Then Saudi Arabia was attacked. And now the market has another excuse not to set a record.
